Episodes.Title: Dic Pics
Episodes.Plot: Alex and Thad deal with the ramifications of a pornographic photo that Thad sent from Alex's phone after it makes its way around campus.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, drug use & content that may offend

Episodes.Title: The Captain
Episodes.Plot: Alex adjusts to becoming the starting quarterback and team captain, Thad awaits word on his future with the team after his drug related arrest following BMS' loss in last season's championship game.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, drug use & content that may offend
Episodes.GuestStars: Denise Richards, Anthony Lemke, Omari Newton, Rob Ramsay

Episodes.Title: Thad's Back
Episodes.Plot: Thad makes some big changes in his life after he realizes his career is in trouble. Alex acts like Thad to motivate the team. Sammy thinks he's met the perfect girl.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, drug use & content that may offend
Episodes.GuestStars: James Cade, Omari Newton, Rob Ramsay

Episodes.Title: The Peak
Episodes.Plot: Alex and Sammy feel that they have peaked after Alex played the best game of his career. The rest of the team is trapped at the Goat House because of lock-down precautions after last years riot. A job offer to Coach Jon Jon causes tense relations with Coach Daniels.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, drug use & content that may offend
Episodes.GuestStars: James Cade, Omari Newton, Rob Ramsay

Episodes.Title: Training Day
Episodes.Plot: Thad offers to help Alex to become a local celebrity. Mary Jo tries to impress Coach Daniel's wife, Debra.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, drug use & content that may offend
Episodes.GuestStars: Denise Richards, Meghan Heffern, Rob Ramsay, Frankie Shaw

Episodes.Title: Blackout
Episodes.Plot: A campus blackout postpones the football game and Alex to settles a score with a cheerleader from the rival team. The coaches of both teams have a poker game with high stakes.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, drug use & content that may offend
Episodes.GuestStars: Lauren Dela Pena, Kwasi Songui, Rob Ramsay

Episodes.Title: Superstition
Episodes.Plot: Harmon seeks out new rituals to restore his kicking skills; Sammy checks out career opportunities.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, drug use & content that may offend

Episodes.Title: Fun Facts
Episodes.Plot: Thad copes with secrets from the coach's past while Alex makes a new connection with Daniels as he prepares to be inducted into the College Hall of Fame.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, drug use & content that may offend

Episodes.Title: The C-Word
Episodes.Plot: Thad suffers a concussion, which affects his behavior and becomes an issue for Coach Daniels. Sammy re-evaluates a personal pastime.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, drug use & content that may offend
Episodes.GuestStars: James Cade, Anthony Lemke, Omari Newton, Rob Ramsay, Denise Richards

Episodes.Title: One Week
Episodes.Plot: A television camera crew follows the team and coaches, and records the tension between Alex and new offensive coordinator Marcus Gilday. The episode also showcases Daniels' insecurities and Thad's pursuit of an acting career.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, drug use & content that may offend

Episodes.Title: Death Penalty
Episodes.Plot: The team finds out they will be playing for the National Championship.

Episodes.Title: The Corn Field (1)
Episodes.Plot: After NCAA violations cost BMS some key players right before the national championship game, Thad builds a field of dreams in a cornfield for the BMS starters to take on the Blackwell starters in an unofficial bowl game.
